data.name: Corona Frustration Elimination
data.detailed_description:
Corona plunged the world into chaos in 2020. That sparked anger and frustration. Here you can let your frustration run free and corona really express your opinion!

Corona Frustration Elimination is a satirical game in which you can really fiddle about corona.

Features

8 creative ways to give the corona virus something on the nose:

  • Knock corona the frying pan on the twelve
  • Use corona as a dartboard
  • Drag the rolling pin over the beet to corona
  • Use the vaccine against corona
  • Nerve corona with a mosquito
  • Blow up corona like a balloon
  • Give corona some electric shocks
  • Use a plump on corona

data.short_description: Corona plunged the world into chaos in 2020. That sparked anger and frustration. Here you can let your frustration run free and Corona really express your opinion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 (32Bit/64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel dual-core (with hyper-threading) CPU, running at 3 GHz (Intel Core i5-3000 series or newer architectures are recommended)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphic card, with at least 2048MB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support. AMD R7 265 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 Ti or newer architectures are recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel dual-core (with hyper-threading) CPU, running at 3 GHz (Intel Core i5-3000 series or newer architectures are recommended)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated graphic card, with at least 2048MB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support. AMD R7 265 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 Ti or newer architectures are recommended.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
